sentences.sentence: She recognized the grating voice of Dr. Sarnoff.
sentences.translation: 她听出了萨诺夫博士那刺耳的嗓音。

sentences.sentence: How was he to twist himself through the grating!
sentences.translation: 他怎么能强行把自己挤压进铁栅栏呢！

sentences.sentence: Would to heaven I had got my head through the grating!
sentences.translation: 但愿我的头能先钻过铁栅栏！
